DOC.brief_summary: The purpose is to investigate and evaluate two new diagnostic methods using ultrasound in the staging of cervical cancer. 1. 3-D-ultrasound of the tumour to estimate its volume and local spread 2. Fusion of PET/CT and ultrasound to evaluate and biopsy lymph nodes.
DOC.brief_title: New Indications for Ultrasound in the Staging of Cervical Cancer
DOC.criteria: Cervical cancer, PET/CT pos. lymph nodes, Patients over 18 years old Pregnancy, Lactating, Diabetic
